name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tabs Manager | Sitespedia - Save, Organize, and Sync Your Browser Tabs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize and manage all the active and inactive tabs on your Chrome browser in one place with the tab manager.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Manager is a powerful browser extension designed to enhance your tab management and organization. With intuitive tools for grouping, sorting, and navigating tabs, it helps you maintain a clutter-free workspace and improve productivity.

1. Comprehensive Tab Management

Tab Grouping: Create and organize tabs into customizable groups for better organization and easy access.

Tab Pinning: Pin essential tabs to keep them easily accessible and prevent accidental closure.
Tab Sorting: Sort tabs automatically or manually by title, URL, or date, allowing for quick and efficient tab management.

2. Advanced Tab Navigation

Tab Search: Utilize a powerful search function to quickly find tabs by title or URL. Filter and locate tabs with ease to enhance productivity.

Keyboard Shortcuts: Employ customizable keyboard shortcuts to swiftly navigate between tabs, groups, and windows, improving workflow efficiency.

Tab Preview: Hover over tabs to view previews of the content, helping you identify and switch to the correct tab without opening each one.

Whether youâ€™re handling numerous tabs for work, research, or personal browsing, Tab Manager offers efficient solutions to keep your tabs organized and accessible.
